extends Object
implements R2ShaderParametersLightType<M>
    A modifiable implementation of the R2ShaderParametersLightType type.

    Use the create() static factory methods to create new instances. Use the toImmutable() method to convert to canonical immutable instances.

    R2ShaderParametersLightMutable is not thread-safe
